traits.Aura of Madness: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

actions.Confounding Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.
